issue.title: Use mark_as_advanced() everywhere that we call find_path() and find_library()

content.raw:
By the way, I noticed only now the CMake-upstream style for these calls is a single `mark_as_advanced` call at the end of the `Find***.cmake` script:

* https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/c1f97af640231ff0cb90e4a1d9a567a2ee85daa5/Modules/FindCups.cmake#L67 
* https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/b67762ff3c4e24be75090cb2dca6c2b0e7f08dcb/Modules/FindMPEG2.cmake#L49 
* https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/blob/b67762ff3c4e24be75090cb2dca6c2b0e7f08dcb/Modules/FindOpenGL.cmake#L534
